Action: # New Application Form: Associate Editor Form
Go to the associate editor "Applications Assigned to You" search
Select an application that is not in the "Accepted" or "Rejected" state, and click "Review application"

Expected Test Results: The associate editor view application form is displayed
"Unlock and Close" is available on the top right
Application Status and Subject Classification sections are available
The main application form questions are available

Action: Assign one or more subject classifications.  Expand the tree and look for values below the top level
Make a superficial modification to the application metadata
Click "Add new note" and enter some text into the new note textarea

Expected Test Results: A flash message tells you "Application updated" or you are scrolled down to a question which has an answer missing.
(Choose an answer for the empty questions)
The changes you applied have been saved
The page closes, and you are able to return to the search interface

Action: Prepare two associate editor accounts (aseditor1 and aseditor2), they both can access to the same Application (e.g. /editor/application/1234)

Expected Test Results: New note UI is displayed for you to fill in
The note is saved and displayed in the list of notes
you username and user id will be showed on that note
the date and time you created the note will be shown

Action: Click into the note field and edit the note
Create a new note as per the above steps
Switch to other associate editor account `aseditor2`

Expected Test Results: You can see the note that you have created before with `aseditor1`
